title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. This is not found when searching for declarations. Search via context menu in packages view works. (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element, and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name. NOTES:
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the search should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name if the Java element cannot be found.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the Search dialog.
4. Enter a search term for declarations.
5. Click the Search button.
6. Verify that the search results display the element names instead of the fully qualified names.
